model

Class BazaOcena

  • Object
    • BazaOcena

  • public class BazaOcena
extends Object
    This class serves as a database for a grade and implements methods for its modification.
    Author:
    Dusan Lekic

      • getValueAt

        public Object getValueAt(int row,
                         int column)
        Returns the value of the database at the selected row and column.
        Parameters:
        row - index of the grade
        column - field of a grade
        Returns:
        the data at the given row and column or null if the params are out of bounds

      • dodajOcenu

        public void dodajOcenu(Student studentPl,
                       Predmet predmet,
                       int ocenaVr,
                       Date datumPl)
        This method adds a grade to the database.
        Parameters:
        studentPl - student to which the grade was given
        predmet - subject of the grade
        ocenaVr - value of the grade
        datumPl - date when the grade was given
